algorithm_technique: Manacher's Algorithm for finding all palindromic substrings efficiently
problem_summary_simple: Count all palindromic substrings within a given string.
problem_summary_technical: Manacher's algorithm preprocesses the string to find the longest palindromic substring centered at each position, enabling O(n) counting.
key_insights: Manacher's algorithm is a linear time solution for finding palindromic substrings.
It handles both odd and even length palindromes by transforming the string with special characters.
The P array stores the radius of the longest palindrome centered at each position.
